txt.en: 'Mae govannen. My name is Narnien and I am here to study the ruins of Haudh Erthaid. Alas, they are occupied by looters, thieves, and worse. As I am delayed in my explorations until the land is cleared, might I impose a boon upon you? If you find anything interesting while you are among the rocks or delving into the hills, I would appreciate it greatly if you would bring it to me.'
Complete \qThe Lost Treasures of Haudh Erthaid\q

Deep beneath the fields and rolling hills of the Angle lie the remnants of battles fought long ago. There are those who have come to plunder the Angle, and those who wish to protect and study its relics.

'You have done so much more than I could have hoped for, my friend! These artifacts will most certainly tide me over until the Angle is a safer place for my studies. I hear that you are doing what you can to further that cause as well. I thank you.'

Complete quests in the Angle for Narnien:

\qThe Lost Treasures of Haudh Erthaid\q
\qThe Crumbling Halls of Glynafon\q
Narnien is located in Gaerond, in the northern Angle.\n\nYou should tell Narnien that you have found enough artifacts for her studies to continue.
